frame.name: Chemical_potency
frame.definition: <def-root>This frame contains words that describe how potent a chemical is.</def-root>

FE.name: Chemical_entity
FE.definition:
<def-root>The entity for which potency is being evaluated.
</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>A modifier expressing the deviation of the potency from the norm expressed by the target LU.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time during which the <fen>Chemical_entity</fen> is in the state of having a particular potency.</def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>Some specification of the circumstances under which the <fen>Chemical_entity</fen> has the ascribed potency.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The location where the <fen>Chemical_entity</fen> has the ascribed potency.</def-root>
